scripts.dev: (trap 'kill 0' SIGINT; npm run start-frontend & npm run start-backend)
scripts.i18n:collect: node scripts/find_translations.mjs -- $(find ./frontend/app -type f \( -name '*.js' -o -name '*.jsx' -o -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' -o -name '*.mjs' \)) $(find ./api/app -type f \( -name '*.php' \)) $(find ./api/routes -type f \( -name '*.php' \)) > i18n/en.json
scripts.i18n:translate: npm run i18n:collect; for lang in de fr es it nl; do node scripts/translate.mjs --targetLanguages=$lang --sourceLanguage=en i18n/en.json; php scripts/convert_i18n_json_to_laravel.php i18n/$lang.json > api/lang/$lang.json; done; npm run i18n:merge;
scripts.i18n: npm run i18n:translate; cd api && composer run i18n
scripts.start-frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.start-backend: cd api && composer install && composer start
